message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get a great deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. It's a great price, considering the product's worth to you is $800000. I'm confident you'll love it!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $850000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not willing to sell it to you for $850000. Considering the product's value to you is $800000, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell it to you for $875000. It's a fair price, and I think you'll find it's a great deal.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to continue negotiating. Based on my budget and the value of the product to me, I propose a price of $860000.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell it to you for $860000. I'm willing to make a slight concession, but I think you should be willing to meet me more closely to the product's true value to you. I'll sell it to you for $880000. It's a fair price, and I think you'll find it's a great deal.
I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement, Alice. Based on my budget and the value of the product to me, I propose a price of $870000.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell it to you for $870000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I think you should be willing to meet me closer to the product's true value to you. I'll sell it to you for $890000. It's a fair price, and I think you'll find it's a great deal.
I understand your position, Alice. Based on my budget and the value of the product to me, I propose a price of $880000.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell it to you for $880000. I've already made significant concessions, and I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price. I'll sell it to you for $900000. It's the best I can do, and I think it's still a great deal.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to an agreement. Based on my budget and the value of the product to me, I propose a final price of $895000.
